data.description: Generic API to any User Interface
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The idea behind UI.pm is that a application may use its OO API to
    create a User Interface.

    The user Interface can be anything that a Backend has being written
    for, like: Gtk+ Qt Curses NCurses Web

    So the application can run using whatever resource (GUI) is
    available.
